question.title: Will Mike Pence be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Mike Pence is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Mike Pence not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Mike Pence is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Will Mike Pence be the Republican candidate for the 2024 Presidential Election in the United States?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if Mike Pence is chosen by the Republican National Convention to be the candidate for the 2024 Presidential Election in the United States. Any other candidates will result in a **No** answer. This question is open to the addition of other candidates beyond those currently listed.

For the purpose of this question, it does not matter who the Republican nominee is on the day of the 2024 election; the determination is based solely on who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee and Mike Pence not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following occur: (a) Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (b) Mike Pence is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Ted Cruz not be the Republican nominee or Mike Pence be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Ted Cruz is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, or (b) Mike Pence is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. It is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Ted Cruz going to be the Republican candidate while Mike Pence will not be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Ted Cruz is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, and (b) Mike Pence is not chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. The decision is based solely on the selections made by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).
